input.sentences: the two men pose in costume before the parade .
the children ride on a parade float together .
the white truck pulls one of the floats in the parade .
the float is decorated in american colors .

output.sentences: They were posing for the costume parade we were having.
The children would ride in the parade float.
Other drivers would pull the floats with the white trucks.
The parade floats were all decorated in beautiful colors.
At the end of the parade, the cast posed for a picture.
